name: Alienated
description:
Team LateStart(we might have started on November the 12th) Presents:

Alienated Aliens and Government forces compete in a series of minigames to (dis)prove the existence of extraterrestrial life!

Alienated is an 1v1 local multiplayer game! Hook up an extra controller and play with keyboard for player 1 and gamepad for player 2!

Features:

  • Alien and Government characters.
  • Fast, chaotic gameplay!
  • 3 Minigames.

Changelog:

  • 1.0: Base Game
  • 1.1: Bug fixes. 

Concept Art by Xandra.

One of the minigames.

Character concept artists by Xandra.
